title: Happy 50th to the First Black Character in "Peanuts" | Emma Gonzalez & Matt Deitsch
itunes:title: Happy 50th to the First Black Character in "Peanuts" | Emma Gonzalez & Matt Deitsch
description:
Women take heat for breastfeeding in public, the first African-American "Peanuts" character turns 50, and March for Our Lives activists Emma Gonzalez and Matt Deitsch stop by.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
